meanings.sent1: The malathion was sprayed in the garden to kill the bugs.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use malathion to protect their crops from harmful insects.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kids thought the malathion was a magic potion to make bugs disappear.
meanings.sent4: The malathion worked like a silent assassin, wiping out the insect population overnight.
meanings.sent5: The smell of malathion lingered in the air, a reminder of its deadly power.

meanings.definition: A substance used to control insects in agriculture and public health.
meanings.sent1: The malathion was applied to the fields to keep pests away from the crops.
meanings.sent2: Health officials sprayed malathion in the neighborhood to prevent the spread of diseases carried by insects.
meanings.sent3: The malathion was like a superhero swooping in to save the day from the pesky bugs.
meanings.sent4: The malathion acted as a shield, protecting the plants from insect attacks.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of malathion in controlling insect populations was evident in the thriving crops.
